list_definition.definition: a warning that one is going to hurt or punish someone

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He will certainly carry out his threat to harm you.

list_definition.definition: a sign of something dangerous or unpleasant which may be, or is, about to happen

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There’s a threat of rain this afternoon.
